<span style="color:grey;font-weight:700;font-size:30px"> Hello! I'm Elgin </span>

I am a PhD candidate in the [Pekosz Lab](www.pekoszlab.com) at the [Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/) in the department of [Molecular Microbiology and Immunology](https://publichealth.jhu.edu/departments/molecular-microbiology-and-immunology). I study the interface between respiratory viruses and the human nasal epithelial cell barrier.
